item.title: LeetCode mySql
item.description: 175 SELECT FirstName, LAStName, City, State FROM person LEFT JOIN address ON person.personID = address.personID; 左外连接，除去address中person没有的元祖 ``` 176 SELECT max(Salary) AS SecondHighestSalary FROM Employee WHERE salary NOT IN (SELECT max(Salary) FROMEmployee); 子查询得到最大值，外层查询的
